title: Failure on Mac El Capitan
body:
1) doesn't find clang compilers

~/Src/spack (develop=) arch-hwloc
$ which clang
/usr/bin/clang
~/Src/spack (develop=) arch-hwloc
$ ./bin/spack compilers
==> Available compilers
-- gcc ----------------------------------------------------------
gcc@5.2.0  gcc@4.2.1
~/Src/spack (develop=) arch-hwloc

2) Cannot install cmake

$ ./bin/spack install cmake
==> Installing cmake
==> Already downloaded /Users/barrysmith/Src/spack/var/spack/stage/cmake-3.4.0-3ji5lddqvejw2y75nf2ebrcqlf6w2htw/cmake-3.4.0.tar.gz.
==> Already staged cmake in /Users/barrysmith/Src/spack/var/spack/stage/cmake-3.4.0-3ji5lddqvejw2y75nf2ebrcqlf6w2htw.
==> No patches needed for cmake.
==> Building cmake.
==> Error: Command exited with status 6:
./configure --prefix=/Users/barrysmith/Src/spack/opt/spack/darwin-x86_64/gcc-5.2.0/cmake-3.4.0-3ji5lddqvejw2y75nf2ebrcqlf6w2htw --parallel=8

See build log for details:
  /private/var/folders/c1/ldz_dt8n2r3dtwv_chp5pfr40000gn/T/spack-stage/spack-stage-OFjo7A/cmake-3.4.0/spack-build.out

/Users/barrysmith/Src/spack/var/spack/packages/cmake/package.py:46, in install:
     44       def install(self, spec, prefix):
     45           configure('--prefix='   + prefix,

> > 46                     '--parallel=' + str(make_jobs))
> >      47           make()
> >      48           make('install')
> > ==> Error: Installation process had nonzero exit code.
> > ~/Src/spack (develop=) arch-hwloc
> > $ cat /private/var/folders/c1/ldz_dt8n2r3dtwv_chp5pfr40000gn/T/spack-stage/spack-stage-OFjo7A/cmake-3.4.0/spack-build.out
> > ## ==> ./configure --prefix=/Users/barrysmith/Src/spack/opt/spack/darwin-x86_64/gcc-5.2.0/cmake-3.4.0-3ji5lddqvejw2y75nf2ebrcqlf6w2htw --parallel=8
> > ## CMake 3.4.0, Copyright 2000-2015 Kitware, Inc.
> > 
> > Error when bootstrapping CMake:
> > Cannot find appropriate C compiler on this system.
> > Please specify one using environment variable CC.
> > See cmake_bootstrap.log for compilers attempted.

---
## Log of errors: /private/var/folders/c1/ldz_dt8n2r3dtwv_chp5pfr40000gn/T/spack-stage/spack-stage-OFjo7A/cmake-3.4.0/Bootstrap.cmk/cmake_bootstrap.log

~/Src/spack (develop=) arch-hwloc
$
